page.title: 02BURNSIDE HOSTEL, EASTFIELD
page.content: Burnside is comprised of a hostel unit to accomodate 25 people; a separate 8 bed unit for older residents; a 16 place day centre for the profoundly mentally handicapped which is attached to the main building; two small group homes and one single person flat in the local vicinity. Burnside aims to assist community integration and develop social awareness skills together with life skills. Activities undertaken in and about the centre range from personal hygiene training to horse riding, swimming and making use of local resources. Each day is planned according to each person's needs. Special, personal training programmes are implemented with a view to improving social adjustment.
